Description:
This discussion at Microsoft Ignite with ChrisBurchett from Blue Yonder, focuses on how AI-driven agents are transforming supply chain management by enabling rapid, automated responses to disruptions, optimizing decision-making, and integrating data across multiple supplier levels. Real-world examples and challenges, such as data integration and explainability, are explored, along with customer use cases in retail and manufacturing.

#Microsoft #MicrosoftCloud
Author: Microsoft Cloud
Title: The New Industrialists | Blue Yonder using AI-driven agents to transform supply chain management
